amendment.description: To authorize the Administrator of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to assist with cleanup and response required by severe marine debris events.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5172 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5172 proposed by Senator Boozman for Senator Sullivan. (consideration: CR S7107; text: CR S7107) To authorize the Administrator of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to assist with cleanup and response required by severe marine debris events.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5172 proposed by Senator Boozman for Senator Sullivan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5172 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
